name: Blaster X HD
description:
BLASTER X HD
Immerse yourself in Over 400+ Levels of non-stop gameplay, with Zero Ads and Zero IAPs in this Arcade Action-Puzzle game for iPad. Blast your way through 9 Diverse Worlds of pure Mental Addiction in one of iPad’s largest titles. Launch your Blaster by pulling your finger back and let it fly! Manipulate and guide your Blaster, as you blast your way through the Orbs to clear each level! These Power Orbs are the fuel to your Blaster and what keeps it moving. A perfect mix of reflexes and wit are needed to propel yourself to the next level!

Non-violent gameplay. Suitable for all ages.

*** Exclusive for ALL Generations of Apple iPad, iPad Air and iPad Mini ***

____________

Accolades (Reviews and Recommendations)

"400 levels of gorgeous action puzzles" - Kotaku.com

"For a game set in a box, Blaster X HD does a lot of thinking outside of it." - 148Apps.com

"Players who especially like physics-based Games, will be thrilled with this promising new Indie Title" - Appgefahren.de

"Arcade gameplays fans looking for a game that will last should try Blaster X HD" - Appolicious.com

"It’s very much one of those games that will have you saying, 'Just one more level,' for many more levels" - TechnologyTell.com

"Great looking levels, addictive gameplay and a seemingly never-ending supply of levels." - DevelopersAccomplice.co.uk
____________


OVER 400 LEVELS OF MENTAL ADDICTION
Test your reflexes and wit, as you conquer Over 400 Hand-Crafted Levels full of vibrant color and detail. From Casual Players to the more Advanced Completionists, come prepared as you will be wrapped up in hours of gameplay.

9 DIVERSE WORLDS
Immerse yourself in all 9 Worlds of Blaster X HD. Whether it is the “proving grounds” of Basics, to the most difficult Sonoma, there are plenty of options and variety to test any skill level and age. (9 Worlds: Arena, Basics, Carbon, District, Horizon, Qore, Reactor, Sky, and Sonoma)

FLUID CONTROL SYSTEM
The Fluid Control System (FCS) in Blaster X HD, is our custom game-mechanic that revitalizes true touch-screen gaming. Fling, manipulate, and guide your Blaster at anytime, leaving you in total control.

STUNNING VISUALS
Enjoy the eye-candy of our blistering graphics - everything in Blaster X HD is created at High Definition (HD) Resolution.

UNLOCKABLES
Everything in Blaster X HD can be unlocked using No Ads or forced In-App Purchases to move gameplay along. Unlock Worlds, Levels, and Blasters with just good-old game time investment.

GAME CENTER LEADERBOARDS
Want to show the World your skills? You can. Post your High Scores for all your favorite levels and see where you rank among the World’s best.

UNIQUE ICON SYSTEM
Most every menu in our User Interface offers an Identifying Icon for selectable options, making sure that even if it is not your native language you can understand and have fun while you play.

100% INDEPENDENT GAME DEVELOPER
Blaster X HD is our debut title at 2GMG (2 Guys Making Games). We are proud to say that we are a 100% Independent Developer and just 2 guys who have a passion for creating great games. No publisher, no funding - just all on our own.

A big "Thank You" to all of our Supporters for making Blaster X HD possible.


***Please help us by RATING and REVIEWING Blaster X HD***
